name: Forest Witch - Age of Mushrooms
description:
Welcome to Forest Witch - Age of Mushrooms

By the Stonestar Games Team:

  • Hannah Trenkle - 2D Asset, Programming, Production
  • Sumin Shim - Characters and Illustrations
  • Zander Krasny - Programming
  • Chloeann Bennet - Character Animations
  • Ray Jackson - Level Designer
  • Maia Gervasone - Audio and Environments

Amanita is an apprentice Forest Witch whose sister-- and mentor-- Reishi disappeared while studying corruption in the enchanted forest they call their home. Now, Amanita must journey into the corrupted forest to find out what happened to her sister and, hopefully, bring her home.

Fight and collect cute mushroom monsters as an apprentice witch.

Combined with card based combat system, witty dialogues and beautiful art, 

Forest Witch: Age of Mushrooms offers an exciting yet heartwarming story of forest guardians.
